document.title: Getting Started
document.description: A comprehensive guide to our project

body.raw:
# Project Management Guide ## Project Roadmap üìã ### Current Tasks - [x] Define project scope - [ ] Design system architecture - [ ] Conduct initial research - [x] Schedule kick-off meeting
## Team Collaboration ü§ù ### Meeting Notes
Date Topic Attendees Status
2024-01-25 Kickoff @johndoe, @janedoe Completed
2024-02-01 Design Review @teamlead Scheduled
### Meeting Notes | Date | Topic | Attendees | Status | | ---------- | ------------- | ------------------ | --------- | | 2024-01-25 | Kickoff | @johndoe, @janedoe | Completed | | 2024-02-01 | Design Review | @teamlead | Scheduled | ## Important Links Check out our project resources: - Website: https://example.com - Repository: www.github.com/project-repo - Documentation: https://docs.example.com ## Technical Challenges We're addressing some key challenges:s Our methodology[^1] focuses on user-centric design. [^1]: Inspired by lean startup principles and agile methodologies. ## Quick Reference ### Section Linking You can directly link to this [section](#technical-challenges) about technical challenges.
